Key Match Events: Bolivia defeated Colombia 1-0 despite playing a large chunk of the match with an extra man after Bolivia midfielder Hector Cuellar was sent off after 20 minutes.
Pre-Game Insights: Colombia had lost only once since February 2022, and that was the 2024 Copa America final to Argentina.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Estadio Municipal de El Alto, which is 4,150 meters above sea level, making it a challenging location for opponents.
